project_descr: Support to the Sri Lanka National Mine Action Programme.

outputs.output_descr: Socio-economic rehabilitation of crisis-affected and risk-prone communities and Internally Displaced Persons supported through an integrated approach to social cohesion and livelihoods.
Government institutions are better able to manage, coordinate, and quality assure mine action in Sri Lanka
donor_name: UN DEPT OF ECONOMIC AND SOCIAL AFFAIRS

outputs.output_descr: Building national capacities for mine action in Sri Lanka, through the contribution from the Australian Government Overseas Aid Program (AusAID).

The project's purpose is to assist Sri Lanka to effectively address the humanitarian and development implications of landmine and Unexploded Ordnance (UXO) contamination in the affected areas. This will be accomplished by strengthening the Sri Lankan capacity for planning, co-coordinating, managing and implementing all aspects of mine action.
Government institutions are better able to manage, coordinate and quality assure mine action in Sri Lanka
